full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Request for Proposal
##### RFP Audio Video Supply and Installation at North Bay

* **Tender Reference Number**: WS3635405690-Doc3641459755
* **Publication Date**: 2022-09-08
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-11-04T14:00:00

#### Summary
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites contractors to submit a proposal for the supply and installation of audio and visual equipment at the Canadian Air Defence Sector (CADS) Operations Centre at CFB North Bay.

#### Key Details
* **Contract No.**: WS3635405690
* **Contract Value**: Undisclosed
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2022-11-30
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2023-12-05
* **Delivery Location**: CFB North Bay, Ontario, Canada
* **Scope of Work**: Supply and installation of audio and visual equipment
* **Contract Duration**: Approximately 6 months

#### Amendments
This tender is subject to the amendments made on 2022-11-01.
* **Changes to Closing Time**: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2022-11-04T14:00:00.
* **Mandatory Site Visit**: A site visit is mandatory on 2022-10-12.

#### Selection Process
Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:
* **Price**: Lowest Price

#### Contact Information
The contracting authority is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), and the bid submission should be addressed to:
Louie Turner (SPAC/PSPC)
louie.turner@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Further information and technical specifications can be accessed through the Ariba Discovery platform at http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14050081?extsite=MTQwNTAwODFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
